comments:
Description:
Exception throws because executeDataset method in DataPreviewTask class doesn't 
define data source and dataset first before it calls dataEngine.prepare
(queryDefn).
Exception info:
WARNING: Data set {Data Set} is not defined
org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.core.DataException: Data set Data Set is not 
defined

Then add define data source and dataset codes.
There are three parameters in executeDataSet( String dataSetName, int maxRow,
			HashMap bindings )
Set something such as listed below to the "bindings" parameter.
bindings.put(new String("p1"),new String("1"));
bindings.put(new String("p2"),new String("2"));
then run the executeDataset method, you will get exception as below:
java.lang.NullPointerException
